body:
Don't you hate when you have butterfingers when you're trying to fight, and you accidentally press "Q" and have a virtual heart attack about how your K/D just got a decimal worse? Well, the map developers feel you too! Rather than having an infomercial to present this content to you, we're giving it to you FREE for the next FOREVER with FREE shipping and handling. Don't believe us? Check out some of our happy customers:

"ok" -Person on Nexus
"Thanks..." -Person on Nexus
"hacker [...]" -Person on CTH
"MODS" -Person on CTH
"ez" -Everyone

So if you call in the next nothing, you will absolutely already have this installed on all Nexus and CTH servers! Don't press Q and lose it, press the mouse and reuse it!

**NOTE: Also stopped pickup of items as well, should it glitch. All maps should have a golden apple killreward anyway.

title: Dropping items now fixed on CTH and Nexus

replies.body:
I tried to make a thread and poke at the "There's got to be a better way" commercials, sorry if I had a little fun =P

The main idea of this is that you can no longer drop or pick up astray items, this solves pressing Q in combat and also solves any other map junk or entities left behind to pick up.

replies.body: Such a very short amount of views...... bumping this update so it can actually be seen.
replies.body_tagged: Such a very short amount of views...... bumping this update so it can actually be seen.

replies.body: You could drop your sword and have the other team get it before. What a nightmare. Thanks!
replies.body_tagged: You could drop your sword and have the other team get it before. What a nightmare. Thanks!

replies.body: Ha. This is funny but, thanks! If this could be used in nebula as well, thay would help. Often times people drop their wood and it despawns automatically so you can't pick it up. If possible, tweak ymls to allow people to pick up blocks especially.
